fullText: The musical, with a book by Bruce Sussman and songs by Mr. Manilow and Mr. Sussman, tells the story of the Comedian Harmonists, a hugely popular German vocal group whose career was cut short by the rise of the Nazis.
dtliExcerpt: The musical, with a book by Bruce Sussman and songs by Mr. Manilow and Mr. Sussman, tells the story of the Comedian Harmonists, a hugely popular German vocal group whose career was cut short by the rise of the Nazis.
